extends java.lang.Object

    Creates a dome object.
    Version:
    (16/12/19)
    Author:
    (J Reece)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Dome​(java.lang.String domeName)
      constructor Add all passes and add to collection Create caverns with doors; add each to its collection

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean canEnter​(int pId, int dNo)
      Returns true if a pass is allowed to enter through the door, false otherwise.Entry can be made if: the rating of the pass >= the rating of the destination cavern AND the destination cavern is not full AND the pass has sufficient tokens AND the pass is currently in the source cavern
      void convertPoints​(int pId)
      Converts a loyalty pass's loyalty points into tokens
      java.lang.String enterCavern​(int pId, int dNo)
      Returns the result of a pass wanting to enter through a door.Entry will be successful if: the rating of the pass >= the rating of the destination cavern AND the destination cavern is not full AND the pass has sufficient tokens AND the pass is currently in the source cavern If the door allows entry, the pass is removed from the source cavern, added to the destination cavern and a suitable message returned.If the door does not allow entry, the state of the system remains unchanged and a suitable message specifying the reason is returned.
      java.lang.String findPass​(int pId)
      Returns the cavern which contains the specified pass
      java.lang.String getAllPasses()
      Returns information about all passes (but not location)
      java.lang.String getCavernNames()
      Return the names of all the caverns
      java.lang.String getDomeName()
      Returns the name of the dome
      void moveAll()
      In an emergency, moves all passes directly back to the outside without affecting tokens or other information using emergency exits
      java.lang.String moveToOutside​(int pId)
      Moves a pass directly to the outside without affecting tokens or other information and using emergency exits
      java.lang.String passesInAllCaverns()
      Returns a String representation of all the passes in all caverns (by cavern)
      java.lang.String passesInCavern​(java.lang.String cName)
      Returns a String representation of all the passes in the specified cavern
      void topUpTokens​(int pId, int tkns)
      Allows a pass to top up its tokens.This method is not concerned with the cost of a token as charges may vary between facilities.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns all information about the current state of the dome, including all passes in all caverns, by cavern name

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • enterCavern

        public java.lang.String enterCavern​(int pId,
                                    int dNo)
        Returns the result of a pass wanting to enter through a door.Entry will be successful if: the rating of the pass >= the rating of the destination cavern AND the destination cavern is not full AND the pass has sufficient tokens AND the pass is currently in the source cavern If the door allows entry, the pass is removed from the source cavern, added to the destination cavern and a suitable message returned.If the door does not allow entry, the state of the system remains unchanged and a suitable message specifying the reason is returned.
        Specified by:
        enterCavern in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        pId - is the id of the pass requesting to enter
        dNo - is the number of the door through which the pass wants to enter
        Returns:
        a String which includes pass id, pass name, name of destination cavern and giving the result of the request

      • canEnter

        public boolean canEnter​(int pId,
                        int dNo)
        Returns true if a pass is allowed to enter through the door, false otherwise.Entry can be made if: the rating of the pass >= the rating of the destination cavern AND the destination cavern is not full AND the pass has sufficient tokens AND the pass is currently in the source cavern
        Specified by:
        canEnter in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        pId - is the id of the pass requesting the move
        dNo - is the number of the door through which the pass wants to enter
        Returns:
        true if the pass can enter through the door,else false

      • topUpTokens

        public void topUpTokens​(int pId,
                        int tkns)
        Allows a pass to top up its tokens.This method is not concerned with the cost of a token as charges may vary between facilities.
        Specified by:
        topUpTokens in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        pId - the id of the pass toping up its tokens
        tkns - the number of tokens purchased to be added to the pass.

        Parameters:
